Html:
I'd love to be able to reorder the attributes on a config section, after I've created them. One thing would be to sort them alphabetically, but I'd also like to be able to create a custom order, e.g. to group things together that belong together.

Right now, I have to open the *.csd file as an XML file and manually go about reordering - would be great if we could do this in the visual designer by 2010 ! :-)

Marc
